title: Auto Queeeeeeeee
body: I choose 2 positions for a reason, I would rather wait then get auto filled in a position I enjoy playing.....thoughts on the system?

replies.body:
I think it would be cool, when it finds a match it tells you what position has been found for you. And you can choose 'Join Game', or 'Join next queue'.
This gives the user the ability to wait if they prefer, or decide bugger it I'll play that role.
